def.dt: :someone who cuts and sells meat in a shop
:someone who kills animals and prepares their meat to be eaten
:a shop that sells meat The town was small but had a grocery store and a butcher (store/shop).
:someone who kills a lot of people or animals in a brutal or cruel way They are a bunch of butchers [=murderers] who gained power by slaughtering their enemies.
:someone who does something very roughly and badly That surgeon is a butcher! [=a terrible surgeon]
:to look at something This may be what we need. Have a butcher's.
:to kill (an animal) and prepare its meat for sale They've hired someone to butcher the hogs.
:to kill (people or animals) in a brutal and cruel way Many innocent people were butchered under his regime.
:to do (something) very badly :to make a mess of (something) The band has butchered my favorite song.
:having a very masculine appearance and way of behaving used especially to describe homosexual women and men
